@alhenderson100 @EnvAgencySW @WestcountryRT Heavy floods upstream will cause this .. I see it on river shannon in iteland now.. the foam does not get broken up on the slower stretches.. I remember this as a young lad on the river nore as well .. both in ireland ..

Remember Remember don't be a victim of waste crime this November

If you are having a bonfire make sure you know where the material has come from and if it is suitable

If you suspect illegal activity report it anonymously to Crimestoppers on 0800 555 111

Our Warwickshire field team have been making sure our national high pressure water pumps are in top condition and ready to be used when needed.  We‚Äôre #flood ready, are you? Check your flood risk now https://t.co/XuFyBxqmQF #Warwickshire https://t.co/lzusuMF5pd

We want judges and magistrates to set bigger fines when waterways are polluted‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶linked to company turnover‚Ä¶

@thameswater was fined nearly ¬£2m for flooding an #Oxfordshire brook with sewage‚Ä¶ Scores of fish died‚Ä¶

Find out more: #DefendersUK, #BBC1: https://t.co/INQuM7xo59 https://t.co/Z5T6VllWAr

We are helping to improve the #Burton #Washlands capacity to hold #water by restoring a range of natural #floodplain #habitats. These natural solutions will work in tandem with the @EnvAgency #flood #defence scheme to help protect properties & livelihoods within the community. https://t.co/OvO3LV1gvb

Even now we are now back in #lockdown2, our essential #winterreadiness work continues and our contractors @Drainsids are still hard at work in #Hemington #Leicestershire. There is a staggering amount of silt in places, that is being removed to reduce #floodrisk in the village. https://t.co/OHOnjC42RL

tweets.text:
Fish can swim freely in another section of the Croal catchment thanks to weir removal üêü

Great partnership work between @GroundworkGM @EnvAgencyNW @greatermcr and @natural_course on this project.

#GMGreenCity

https://t.co/dfR75ykW0A

We‚Äôre proud to launch the biggest nationwide initiative to restore nature in England üå±

Together, we will deliver a #NatureRecovery Network of more and better connected spaces for people and nature.

Join our partnership: https://t.co/k88JWjvMsO

#TogetherForNature https://t.co/yaKy4AR7qi

The River Roding catchment was polluted with sewage more than 550 times in 2019. It has one of the biggest concentrations of sewage works, combined sewers & pumping stations around London
The rivers flow through parks but no one is told they risk coming into contact with sewage.

Please avoid the foot / cycle path alongside of the River Ouse in York upstream, river left of Scarborough Bridge to allow the @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyYNE to do some preparation work for improving flood defences in the area. https://t.co/cqYbMFGoVG

#30DayMapChallenge #Day5 #Blue
The blue of water courses and bodies in #Dorset, noting the impact of chalk on surface drainage. With a nod to Miles Davies. @tjukanov @QGIS @EnvAgency @DorsetAONB @CranborneChase #GIS https://t.co/tvHUxk5Ks9

urls.title: Nature Recovery Network
urls.description: We use some essential cookies to make this website work. We‚Äôd like to set additional cookies to understand how you use GOV.UK, remember your settings and improve government services. We also use cookies set by other sites to help us deliver content from their services. Where we have identified any third party copyright information you will need to obtain permission from the copyright holders concerned. This publication is available at https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/nature-recovery-network/nature

tweets.text:
As we head further into Winter #beprepared and check your #flood risk now. Sign up to get warnings in England by phone, email or text message if your home or business is at risk of flooding. The service is free. 
https://t.co/4RNmEplRO4 @EnvAgencyMids https://t.co/Xhpp2wNH9t

Please don't host private, unregulated bonfires & fireworks in your garden or in the community. Be kind & thoughtful towards your neighbours & pets. Garden fires can quickly get out of control. Find alternatives such as virtual firework displays #StaySafe

https://t.co/pCK0RiABOi https://t.co/IvujXp06vS
